instructions.1: Line 9x5-inch loaf pan with foil. Spoon sorbet into pan; freeze 10 minutes.
instructions.2: Pour milk into large bowl. Add dry pudding mix. Beat with wire whisk 2 minutes or until well blended. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spread pudding mixture over sorbet in pan.
instructions.3: Freeze 3 hours or overnight. To unmold, invert pan onto plate; remove foil. Top with raspberries just before serving. Let stand 10 to 15 min. to soften before cutting into 12 slices.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the sorbet from Step 1 being used?
Is sorbet from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is pudding mixture from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the sorbet in Step 2?
